headings.usage: Main headings, hero titles, emotional statements

body.usage: UI text, buttons, descriptions, data tables

landing_page.description: Asymmetric grid mixing large hero images with smaller detail shots. Use negative space to let images breathe.
rules: Never center text unless it's a standalone quote.
Use parallax effects on large background images.
Overlay text on images must have a dark gradient scrim.

client_gallery.description: Pinterest-style layout that respects original aspect ratios (portrait vs landscape).
rules: No cropping of images in the grid.
Gap should be small (gap-2 or gap-4) to create a cohesive 'wall of memories'.
Lazy load images with a blur-up effect.

admin_dashboard.description: Functional, data-rich interface for managing thousands of photos.
rules: Sidebar navigation for quick access to events/clients.

buttons.primary: bg-[#D4AF37] text-black hover:bg-[#B5952F] rounded-none uppercase tracking-widest text-xs font-bold px-8 py-3 transition-all
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-white/20 text-white hover:bg-white hover:text-black rounded-none uppercase tracking-widest text-xs font-bold px-8 py-3 transition-all

cards.event: group relative overflow-hidden bg-[#121212] border border-white/5 hover:border-[#D4AF37]/50 transition-all duration-500
cards.pricing: bg-[#121212] border border-white/10 p-8 flex flex-col gap-4 hover:transform hover:-translate-y-1 transition-transform

inputs.default: bg-[#0a0a0a] border-white/10 focus:border-[#D4AF37] text-white placeholder:text-white/20 rounded-none h-12

visual_enhancers.noise_texture: url('/noise.png') opacity-5 fixed inset-0 pointer-events-none z-50

motion.page_transition: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} exit={{ opacity: 0, y: -20 }} transition={{ duration: 0.4, ease: 'easeOut' }}
motion.image_reveal: initial={{ scale: 1.1, opacity: 0 }} animate={{ scale: 1, opacity: 1 }} transition={{ duration: 0.8 }}

general: Implement Dark Mode by default. Add 'dark' class to html/body.
Use 'Cormorant Garamond' for all H1-H3 headings.
Ensure all images have a lazy-loading strategy.
Use Shadcn UI components but override styles to match the 'Dark Luxury' aesthetic defined in 'components' section.
For the Client Gallery, implement a Masonry layout (use 'react-responsive-masonry' or CSS columns).

pages.landing: Focus on large, immersive imagery. Use the 'Tetris Grid' layout.
pages.gallery: Minimalist interface. Hide UI elements until hover. Focus purely on the photos.
pages.admin: Dense, functional. Use tables with sticky headers.

universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
